response.overview: I'm about to leave for college and everyone is wanting a piece of my time before I go. I feel drained and I haven't even got a chance to cope with the idea that I am leaving the only home I've ever known. I was looking forward to having a Friday night at home alone. I walked in the door and called for them, "Mom... Jill?.. Anyone home?" The house was so quiet, I stepped out in the patio, it was warm outside, peaceful, so I brought my jerk-pad out of my backpack. The hot sun on my shoulders was periodically cooled by a September breeze trying to push the Summer into Autumn, and it made my pressures feel trivial. The seasons were changing whether or not I was ready for it, maybe I ought to just go with the flow like the seasons. I sat down and pulled up one of my favorite porns, the perfect mind diversion, and I relaxed and stroked my cock.
response.title: Watching Porn with Sister IV
